Articles.Content:
Title says it. I only have space on my screen when I am at the KSC. Loading saves does nothing. New game does nothing. If I go to a scenario, I can see the game for a split second before everything goes black. I tried a tutorial for ship building, and I was able to go into the VAB, however the categories were hidden and I couldn't switch.

[http://s17.postimg.org/i8phcjlkf/2015_07_15_00001.jpg](http://s17.postimg.org/i8phcjlkf/2015_07_15_00001.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T21:26:37Z" title="07/15/2015 09:26  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by handsmahoney**

This happens with me sometimes, but it's normally fixed by exiting the game and going back to it, and it's never spread to different save files. Have you tried closing down the game completely and reloading it?
Happened to me, but reloading the game did the trick. Try backing up your saves and then re installing the game...
Yeah, a core part of the game might be bugged. It could have been a mod since I don't think any stock game bugs could do anything that dangerous. I would reinstall the game.
Alright, I'll give that a shot

Reinstalling didn't do anything, it has to be a mod

edit: after three frustrating hours, I finally nailed it down. it was either outer planets mod or kopernicus

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-16T05:50:03Z" title="07/16/2015 05:50  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 16, 2015</time> by handsmahoney**
